content: every girl loves to twirl pirouette twirls will be your girl s favourite skirt the pattern is written for 4 yarn weights fingering dk worsted & aran and from size 6m/17 waist to 12y/25 waist the pattern is very simple and perfect for a beginner knitter it is also very easy to customise length yardage requirements size/waist measurement - fingering / dk / worsted / aran yards 6m/17 - 350 / 300 / 300 / 300 12m/18 - 400 / 350 / 300 / 300 18m/19 - 450 / 400 / 350 / 350 2y/20 - 500 / 500 / 450 / 450 4y/21 - 600 / 600 / 550 / 550 6y/22 - 750 / 700 / 650 / 650 8y/23 - 850 / 700 / 700 / 700 10y/24 - 900 / 750 / 750 / 750 12y/25 - 1000 / 850 / 850 / 800 if you have personally hand-knitted the item feel free to do with it as you wish including selling the item 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/indie-design-gift-a-long 2 http //www ravelry com/bundles/3894
